messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN TORBAY
messages.content: Marcus Wood, your local Conservative Parliamentary Candidate lives and works in the Bay with his wife Karen. They have two daughters at the Girls Grammar School. Since 2002 he has been campaigning on behalf of local residents on a wide range of local and national issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Marcus is a passionate supporter of the NHS and he and his family have always relied on it for everything.

issues.health: Marcus is a passionate supporter of the NHS and he and his family have always relied on it for everything.
